com.dpsframework.core.engines

Class RBEngineCLIPS

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dpsframework.core.engines.RBEngineCLIPSRouter
      • com.dpsframework.core.engines.RBEngineCLIPS
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RBEngine, net.sf.clipsrules.jni.Router

    public class RBEngineCLIPS
extends RBEngineCLIPSRouter
implements RBEngine
    CLIPS Engine Prototype. It is used by PsNodeAgents to connect to its CLIPS-Engine instance.
    Since:
    2015, update at: 2018-08-24
    Version:
    1.7 (Build.1814)
    Author:
    Francisco J. Aguayo (Leon University / IEEE Power & Energy Systems Society Member)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private RBEngineCLIPS()
      A default constructor with following functions: to lock instancing without parameters, to test machine architecture, to initialize a Log file inside Agent directories or Framework /logs/, and to add CLIPS - JNI path Library at runtime.
        RBEngineCLIPS(net.sf.clipsrules.jni.Environment outEnv)
      Constructor was calling from an Agent, which connects to external CLIPS Engine.
        RBEngineCLIPS(int mode)
      Constructor was calling from Console-command-line.
        RBEngineCLIPS(java.lang.Object outEnv)
      Constructor was calling with a previous CLIPS Environment as a wrapper object.
        RBEngineCLIPS(java.lang.Object outEnv, java.lang.ThreadGroup tg, java.lang.String tn)
      Constructor was calling from an Agent running inside JADE Platform.
        RBEngineCLIPS(java.lang.ThreadGroup tg, java.lang.String tn)
      Constructor was calling from an Agent, which requests a new CLIPS-Engine instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RBEngineCLIPS

        private RBEngineCLIPS()
        A default constructor with following functions: to lock instancing without parameters, to test machine architecture, to initialize a Log file inside Agent directories or Framework /logs/, and to add CLIPS - JNI path Library at runtime.

      • RBEngineCLIPS

        public RBEngineCLIPS(int mode)
        Constructor was calling from Console-command-line.
        Parameters:
        mode - outside CLIPS Environment.

      • RBEngineCLIPS

        public RBEngineCLIPS(net.sf.clipsrules.jni.Environment outEnv)
        Constructor was calling from an Agent, which connects to external CLIPS Engine.

        NOTE: It is only used to control engines that runs inside another systems o applications (e.g. a Jess-Tab plugging from Protegee OWL Ontology IDE).

        Parameters:
        outEnv - outside CLIPS Environment.

      • RBEngineCLIPS

        public RBEngineCLIPS(java.lang.Object outEnv)
        Constructor was calling with a previous CLIPS Environment as a wrapper object.
        Parameters:
        outEnv - outside CLIPS Environment.

      • RBEngineCLIPS

        public RBEngineCLIPS(java.lang.ThreadGroup tg,
             java.lang.String tn)
        Constructor was calling from an Agent, which requests a new CLIPS-Engine instance.
        Parameters:
        tg - ThreadGroup is imposed by JADE Platform.
        tn - ThreadName is imposed by PsNodeAgent.

      • RBEngineCLIPS

        public RBEngineCLIPS(java.lang.Object outEnv,
             java.lang.ThreadGroup tg,
             java.lang.String tn)
        Constructor was calling from an Agent running inside JADE Platform.
        Parameters:
        tg - ThreadGroup is imposed by JADE Platform.
        tn - ThreadName is imposed by JADE PsNodeAgent.
        outEnv - Environment is imposed by some external system.
